mn139:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn139:2.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn139:2.3_1: bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn139:3.1_0: “Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:3.1_1: na ca attakilamathānuyogamanuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ.
mn139:3.2_1: ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā,
mn139:3.2_2: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
mn139:3.4_0: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya, na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyya.
mn139:3.7_0: Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe.
mn139:4.1_0: ‘Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:4.1_1: na ca attakilamathānuyogamanuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitan’ti—
mn139:4.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ; Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:4.3_0: Yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
mn139:4.3_1: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho; micchāpaṭipadā.
mn139:4.4_0: Yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyogo hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:4.4_1: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho; sammāpaṭipadā.
mn139:4.5_1: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho; micchāpaṭipadā.
mn139:4.6_0: Yo attakilamathānuyogaṁ ananuyogo dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:4.6_1: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho; sammāpaṭipadā.
mn139:4.7_0: ‘Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:4.7_1: na ca attakilamathānuyogaṁ anuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitan’ti—
mn139:4.8_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:5.1_0: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā,
mn139:5.1_1: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattatī’ti—
mn139:5.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:5.4_0: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
mn139:5.5_0: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā,
mn139:5.5_1: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattatī’ti—
mn139:5.6_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:6.2_0: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya, na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyyā’ti—
mn139:6.3_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:7.1_1: ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā?
mn139:7.2_0: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ anuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:7.2_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.4_0: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:7.4_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.6_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.8_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.10_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.12_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:7.14_1: ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā.
mn139:8.1_1: nevussādanā hoti na apasādanā, dhammadesanā ca?
mn139:8.2_0: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ anuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:8.2_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.4_0: ‘Anuyogo ca kho sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:8.7_0: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:8.7_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.9_0: ‘Ananuyogo ca kho adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:8.12_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.14_0: ‘Anuyogo ca kho sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:8.17_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.19_0: ‘Ananuyogo ca kho adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:8.22_1: sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.24_0: ‘Bhavasaṁyojane ca kho appahīne bhavopi appahīno hotī’ti—
mn139:8.26_1: sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
mn139:8.28_0: ‘Bhavasaṁyojane ca kho pahīne bhavopi pahīno hotī’ti—
mn139:8.30_1: nevussādanā hoti na apasādanā, dhammadesanā ca.
mn139:8.32_0: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya, na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyyā’ti—
mn139:8.33_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:9.3_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:9.6_0: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
mn139:9.10_0: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
mn139:9.12_1: ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ idaṁ vuccati kāmasukhaṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ puthujjanasukhaṁ anariyasukhaṁ.
mn139:9.14_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn139:9.15_0: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn139:9.16_0: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
mn139:9.18_0: Idaṁ vuccati nekkhammasukhaṁ pavivekasukhaṁ upasamasukhaṁ sambodhisukhaṁ.
mn139:9.22_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:10.1_0: ‘Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe’ti—
mn139:10.4_1: yaṁ jaññā rahovādaṁ abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ sasakkaṁ taṁ rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya.
mn139:10.5_0: Yampi jaññā rahovādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ tassapi sikkheyya avacanāya.
mn139:10.6_0: Yañca kho jaññā rahovādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ tatra kālaññū assa tassa rahovādassa vacanāya.
mn139:10.7_1: yaṁ jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ sasakkaṁ taṁ sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ na bhāseyya.
mn139:10.8_0: Yampi jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ tassapi sikkheyya avacanāya.
mn139:10.9_0: Yañca kho jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ tatra kālaññū assa tassa sammukhā khīṇavādassa vacanāya.
mn139:10.10_0: ‘Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe’ti—
mn139:10.11_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:11.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:11.3_1: taramānassa bhāsato kāyopi kilamati, cittampi upahaññati, saropi upahaññati, kaṇṭhopi āturīyati,
mn139:11.4_1: ataramānassa bhāsato kāyopi na kilamati, cittampi na upahaññati, saropi na upahaññati, kaṇṭhopi na āturīyati,
mn139:11.6_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:12.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn139:12.3_1: janapadaniruttiyā ca abhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca atisāro?
mn139:12.5_0: Iti yathā yathā naṁ tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti tathā tathā thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
mn139:12.7_1: janapadaniruttiyā ca abhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca atisāro.
mn139:12.8_1: janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca anatisāro?
mn139:12.9_1: tadevekaccesu janapadesu ‘pātī’ti sañjānanti, ‘pattan’ti sañjānanti, ‘vittan’ti sañjānanti, ‘sarāvan’ti sañjānanti, ‘dhāropan’ti sañjānanti, ‘poṇan’ti sañjānanti, ‘pisīlavan’ti sañjānanti.
mn139:12.10_0: Iti yathā yathā naṁ tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti ‘idaṁ kira me āyasmanto sandhāya voharantī’ti tathā tathā voharati aparāmasaṁ.
mn139:12.11_1: janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso hoti, samaññāya ca anatisāro.
mn139:12.13_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn139:13.1_1: yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
mn139:13.1_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.4_1: yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyogo hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:13.4_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.7_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.10_1: yo attakilamathānuyogaṁ ananuyogo dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ,
mn139:13.10_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.13_2: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati,
mn139:13.13_3: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.16_1: yāyaṁ ussādanā ca apasādanā ca no ca dhammadesanā,
mn139:13.16_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.19_1: yāyaṁ nevussādanā ca na apasādanā ca dhammadesanā ca,
mn139:13.19_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.22_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.25_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.28_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.31_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.34_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.37_1: yvāyaṁ sammukhā khīṇavādo abhūto ataccho anatthasaṁhito,
mn139:13.37_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.40_1: yvāyaṁ sammukhā khīṇavādo bhūto taccho anatthasaṁhito,
mn139:13.40_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.43_1: yvāyaṁ sammukhā khīṇavādo bhūto taccho atthasaṁhito,
mn139:13.43_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.46_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.49_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:13.52_1: yvāyaṁ janapadaniruttiyā ca abhiniveso samaññāya ca atisāro,
mn139:13.52_2: sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
mn139:13.55_1: yvāyaṁ janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso samaññāya ca anatisāro,
mn139:13.55_2: adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho;
mn139:14.2_0: saraṇañca dhammaṁ ñatvā araṇañca dhammaṁ ñatvā araṇapaṭipadaṁ paṭipajjissāmā’ti evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbaṁ.
mn139:14.5_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
